listeningQuestion.question: What are the three factors that caused the fish to grow so large?
listeningQuestion.translation: 导致这些鱼长得如此巨大的三个因素是什么？

editorNotes: 这篇文章讲述了北海石油钻井平台附近出现的巨型鱼类现象。文章通过描述这些异常生长的鱼类，反映了人类活动对海洋生态系统的影响。语法重点包括复合名词的单复数用法、现在完成时和被动语态的使用。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
dialogue: Fish and chips has always been a favourite dish in Britain.
The oceans have been overfished.
Fish has become more and more expensive.
It comes as a surprise to learn about giant fish.
These giant fish are terrifying the divers on North Sea oil rigs.
Oil rigs have to be repaired frequently.
Divers often have to work in darkness.
They work a hundred feet under water.
Divers have been frightened out of their wits.
Giant fish bump into them as they work.
Now they have had special cages made.
These cages protect them from these monsters.
The fish are not sharks or killer whales.
They are favourite eating varieties like cod and skate.
These fish grow to unnatural sizes.
Sometimes they grow as much as twelve feet in length.
Three factors have caused these fish to grow so large.
The first factor is the warm water round the hot oil pipes under the sea.
The second factor is the plentiful supply of food.
This food is thrown overboard by the crews on the rigs.
The third factor is the total absence of fishing boats around the oil rigs.
As a result, the fish just eat and eat.
They grow and grow in the lovely warm water.
Who eats who?

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 油煎鱼加炸土豆片一直是英国人喜爱的一道菜。
随着海洋里的滥捕滥捞，鱼已经变得越来越昂贵。
因此，听说北海石油钻井平台上的潜水员受到巨型鱼类的恐吓，确实很让人吃惊。
钻井平台需要经常修理。
潜水员常常要在水面100英尺以下摸黑工作。
他们曾在工作时被撞到他们身上的大鱼吓得惊惶失措。
现在他们有了特制的笼子。
这些笼子用来保护他们免受大鱼的侵袭。
这些鱼并不是鲨鱼或逆戟鲸。
它们是深受人们喜爱的食用鱼品种，如鳕鱼和鳐鱼。
只不过它们长得出奇地大。
这些鱼能长得这么大是由3个因素造成的。
第一个因素是海底热的输油管道附近的温暖的海水。
第二个因素是钻井平台工作人员抛到海里充足的食物。
第三个因素是钻井平台周围根本没有捕鱼船只。
结果是，这些鱼就在可爱的温暖的水流中吃呀吃，长呀长。

multipleChoice.question: Why have the fish grown so large?
options: Because they are a special species
Because of the warm water and plentiful food
Because they are being genetically modified
Because they are being overfed by divers
multipleChoice.explanation: 文章提到三个因素：温暖的海水、充足的食物供应和没有捕鱼船只的干扰。

fillInBlanks.hint: 注意复合名词的单复数用法

notes.title: 文化背景
notes.content: 这篇文章反映了人类活动对海洋生态系统的深远影响。石油钻井平台的存在不仅改变了海洋环境，还影响了海洋生物的生存方式。这种现象提醒我们要关注环境保护和生态平衡。
